medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has had hypertension since age 56 years, with systolic blood pressure around 150 mm Hg, controlled using multiple antihypertensive medications. Symptoms progressed, prompting further investigation after a chest CT revealed a right adrenal mass.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, diagnosed at age 56. Family history of hypertension in both parents.
medical_history.family_history: Both parents had hypertension. A younger brother diagnosed with hypertension at age 50.
